message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, but I'm open to discussing the price if you're interested.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8,000. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is my bottom line. This product is worth every penny of that price. I'm happy to answer any questions you have about its value.
